Ruan

Korean: 루안

Birthday:
Mar 16, 2004
Age:
21 years old
Height:
5'3" (160 cm)

Introduction

Ruan is a Japanese singer, rapper, dancer, and actress under KISS Entertainment.

In 2024, Ruan participated in the reality survival show "Chuang Asia Thailand" where she finished 2nd place, securing her spot as a member of the project global girl group Gen1es.

In 2021, she participated on the South Korean survival program "Girls Planet 999", where she was eliminated in episode 11.
